featuredWebinars.title: Future of Music Technology
featuredWebinars.description: Explore how AI, VR, and immersive tools are transforming the way music is created and experienced.

featuredWebinars.title: Songwriting Secrets
featuredWebinars.description: Learn advanced techniques for crafting lyrics and melodies that connect deeply with audiences.

featuredWebinars.title: Mastering Live Performance
featuredWebinars.description: Discover strategies to build stage confidence, engage audiences, and deliver unforgettable shows.

featuredWebinars.title: Music Business 101
featuredWebinars.description: Understand contracts, royalties, and marketing essentials to grow your career in the music industry.

featuredWebinars.title: Mixing & Mastering Masterclass
featuredWebinars.description: Get hands-on insights into professional mixing and mastering workflows used in top studios.

featuredWebinars.title: Global Rhythms
featuredWebinars.description: Dive into world music traditions and learn how to incorporate diverse rhythms into your compositions.

featuredWebinars.title: Building a Music Brand
featuredWebinars.description: Discover how to create a strong identity, design visuals, and connect with fans authentically.

featuredWebinars.title: Digital Distribution Demystified
featuredWebinars.description: Learn how to release your music on streaming platforms and maximize your reach globally.

featuredWebinars.title: Jazz Improvisation Live
featuredWebinars.description: Join expert musicians as they break down improvisation techniques and perform live demonstrations.

featuredWebinars.title: Music for Film & Games
featuredWebinars.description: Explore the art of composing soundtracks and scores that enhance storytelling in visual media.
